column2: SO130F COURTHILL LOOP NORTH JUNCTION TOCOURTHILL LOOP SOUTH JUNCTION
SO130H SALTWOOD JUNCTION TO CTRL/ET BOUNDARY

The non-stop headway applies for consecutive departures from Otford in the Up direction providing the first traindoes not stop at Shoreham and the correct headway is applied at the next common timing point irrespective ofcalling pattern. National TPR section 1.5.5 Application of Planning Headways refers
All freight trains which will travel on the DownMaidstone
